context.p: This example shows a procedure that splits into different paths following a condition. The example that follows is for steps to handle retry failures.

step.cmd: Retrieve the row corresponding to the caller reference.

chrow.chdesc: Change download status to Download Canceled.

chrow.choption: E-mail the customer a description of the failure.

example.codeblock: <steps> <step> <cmd>Retrieve the row corresponding to the caller reference.</cmd> </step> <step> <cmd>Retry or fail the transaction.</cmd> <choicetable> <chhead> <choptionhd>To Retry a Transaction</choptionhd> <chdeschd>To Fail a Transaction</chdeschd> </chhead> <chrow> <choption>Change transaction status to Pending.</choption> <chdesc>Call RetryTransaction.</chdesc> </chrow> <chrow> <choption>Poll results using GetResults.</choption> <chdesc>Discard results using DiscardResults.</chdesc> </chrow> <chrow> <choption>Change transaction status to Failure.</choption> <chdesc>Change download status to Download Canceled.</chdesc> </chrow> <chrow> <choption>E-mail the customer a description of the failure.</choption> <chdesc>Discard results using DiscardResults.</chdesc> </chrow> </choicetable> </step> </steps>
